name: Haugbui
damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, thunder
damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained
languages: the languages it knew in life, telepathy 120 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The haugbui makes three Psychic Blast attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Psychic Blast
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) psychic damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The haugbui magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the haugbui wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The haugbui casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
At will: dancing lights, mending, purify food and drink, spare the dying
3/day each: gust of wind, telekinesis
1/day each: dispel magic, remove curse

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The haugbui can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the haugbui has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The haugbui has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The hangbui doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
